name: A Spec of Hollow
description:
A Spec of Hollow is a short demake and redesign of Hollow Knight, based on the restrictions imposed by the Super Nintendo Entertainment System.

Made for the Retro Jam 2021

Controls:

Arrows - Move

WASD = XYBA on the SNES  controller

A (D on the keyboard) - Jump

X (W on the keyboard) - Attack

B (S on the keyboard) - Focus

Theme: Side Effects

Like in the original, you leave a ghost behind when you die, and you have to kill it next time you go to the same area

All pixel art, music, and sound effects were made by me during the jam period. Very few code snippets I reused from an older project. Font used is Atari ST 8x16.
